description:
Yair Etziony from Polar Squad will speak on 'DevOps – A Search For a Better Definition'

In my talk, I would try to find a better definition of the term DevOps. Whats are the relations between DevOps to sysadmins, cloud computing, and your organizational culture. Why do so many DevOps transformations fail? I will try to use some ideas from philosophy, comparative literature, and my experience to try and find a better definition for that term.
title: Cloud native & devOps talks - DevOps – A Search For a Better Definition
